properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 4:50AM AKST until February 18 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Bristol Bay.

* WHEN...From noon today to 5 AM AKST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow are expected across
Bristol Bay starting this afternoon as a front moves across the
area. Strongest winds are expected along the coast. Winds will
also increase through Kamishak Gap this afternoon through late
this evening, causing conditions to worsen near Iliamna in
blowing snow. A band of snow setting up over Bristol Bay will
keep snow falling overnight into Tuesday morning when winds
begin to weaken.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM AKST TUESDAY
